revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = HP t410 Smart Zero Client.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Smart Zero Client |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.hp.com/us-en/thin-clients/t410.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = HP |model = t410 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = H2W23AT |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = thin client |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;DM8148;TMS320DM8148; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6406EM2I-12G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = SanDisk;SDIN7DP2-4G; |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G63FFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8033; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = D4:F5:13, 84:7E:40
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 9-pin header,, (115200 8N1),, COMA |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = VGA out, DisplayLink, Audio in/out (3.5mm), RTC w/ battery backup, buzzer, power switch |addchip = 2K Serial EEPROM;STMicro;24C02WP;;1;,,, 7-Port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2517-JZX;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3243C;;1;,,, Mixed Signal Microcontroller;Texas Instruments;MSP430F5309;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Audio Codec;Texas Instruments;TLV320AIC3106;;1;,,, Component Video Graphics D/A System;Texas Instruments;THS8200;;1;,,, DisplayPort to HDMI/DVI Converter;Parade Technologies;DP501HDM;;1;,,, High Input Voltage 150mA LDO Regulator;ANPEC Electronics;APL5155;;1;,,, 2A Transient Response Linear Regulator;ANPEC Electronics;APL5337;;1;,,, 30V 10.5A N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;5;,,, 30V 12A P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4407A;;1;,,, Dual N-Channel Trench Power MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4214DDY;;1;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gates w/ 3-State Outputs;TI:SN74ACHT125;;1;,,, Power Management Unit with DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS659113;;1;,,, Low Voltage Synchronous Buck Controller;ON Semi;NCP1587;;1;,,, 4.5-17V 5A Synchronous Step Down Converter;TI;TPS54521;;1;,,, 2A Ultra Low Dropout LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9025;;2;,,, 1.5A Dual Channel Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2182;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2012 |estprice = 199 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16859107892 |asin = B009F1CRZQ |asin_country = GB |asin2 = B009F1CRZQ |asin_country2 = CA |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Atlas Rev.A MB", "11036-1", "48.3FF02.011" and "MADE IN CHINA" :are silkscreened on board bottom
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] TMS320 (DM8148) @1GHz :ARM (Cortex-A8), 256KB L2 cache with [https://www.ti.com/ds_dgm/images/fbd_sprs647e.gif ''Neon'' FPU] *GPU: PowerVR SGX530 (OpenGL ES2.0, OpenCL 1.1) *Video: DisplayPort (1.1a), VGA *Storage: 8MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 4GB (eMMC) *Memory: [[SK hynix]] 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V/2A via barrel
==See also== :;[[HP]] • [https://www.hp.com/us-en/thin-clients.html Thin Clients] *[[HP t5325]] Thin Client :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 @1.2GHz :RAM: 512MB (DDR2), Flash: 512MB *[[HP t5335z]] Thin Client :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88AP510 @1.0GHz :RAM: 1GB (DDR3), Flash: 512MB *[[HP t310]] G2 (AiO) Zero Client :CPU: ''TERA'' 2321 PCoIP Zero Client :RAM: 512MB (DDR3-1333), Flash: 32MB (SPI) *[[HP t410 Smart Zero Client]] :CPU: [[TI]] TMS320 (DM8148) @1GHz (1 core) :RAM: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM @400MHz *[[HP t430]] Thin Client :[[Intel Celeron]] N4020 @1.1GHz/2.8GHz (2 cores, 4MB L2 cache) :4GB (DDR4-2400) SDRAM (onboard) *[[HP t540]] Thin Client :CPU: [[AMD]] R1305G ''Ryzen'' Embedded w/ ''Radeon Vega 3'' Graphics :RAM: 16GB (DDR4-2400) SDRAM *[[HP t640]] Thin Client :CPU: [[AMD]] R1505G @2.4GHz/3.3GHz (2 cores, 1MB cache) :RAM: 16GB (DDR4) dual-channel SDRAM *[[HP t740]] Thin Client • w/ ''Radeon Vega 8'' Graphics :CPU: [[AMD]] V1756B ''Ryzen'' @3.25GHz/3.6GHz (4 cores, 2MB cache) :RAM: 16GB (DDR4) dual-channel SDRAM
[[Category:English Documentation]]
